//Author: Ginna Woo
//Description: This UEBA analytic looks at all Service Principal Activities to identify potential risky Service Principal behaviors. 
//False Positive(s): None known

//looks for ALL service principal activities in the AL table
let AL = AuditLogs 
| where ActivityDisplayName has "service principal" 
| where Result == "success"
| extend AppID = tostring(AdditionalDetails[1].value)
| extend creationTime = ActivityDateTime
| extend userPrincipalName = tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName)
| extend ServicePrincipalId = tostring(InitiatedBy.app.servicePrincipalId)
| extend ServicePrincipalName = tostring(InitiatedBy.app.displayName)
| extend ipAddress_creator = tostring(InitiatedBy.user.ipAddress)
| extend targetedResource = tostring(TargetResources.[0].displayName)
| extend targetedResourceID = tostring(TargetResources.[0].id)
| extend targetedResourceType = tostring(TargetResources.[0].type)
| extend targetedUserName = tostring(TargetResources.[0].userPrincipalName)
| project TimeGeneratedAL = TimeGenerated, AppID, userPrincipalName, ServicePrincipalId, ServicePrincipalName, OperationName, targetedResource, targetedResourceID, targetedResourceType, targetedUserName, Category, ResultDescription, CorrelationId, Resource, Identity, ResultReason, Result, ActivityDisplayName, AADOperationType;
//Grabs IPs from AADServicePrincipalSignInLogs
let ServicePrincipal = AADServicePrincipalSignInLogs
//| extend Ips = pack("IpAddress", IPAddress)
| extend AppID = AppId
| distinct IPAddress, AppID, ServicePrincipalId, ServicePrincipalName
| summarize make_list(IPAddress) by AppID, ServicePrincipalId, ServicePrincipalName;
//grabbing enriching data (ActivityInsight col) from BA table
let BA = BehaviorAnalytics 
| extend userPrincipalName = UserPrincipalName 
| evaluate bag_unpack(ActivityInsights, columnsConflict="replace_source") 
| extend ActionUncommonlyPerformedByUser = column_ifexists("ActionUncommonlyPerformedByUser","")
| where tostring(ActionUncommonlyPerformedByUser)==True //added extra filter 
| project-away Type, DevicesInsights, UsersInsights, SourceIPAddress, UserName, TimeProcessed, TenantId, SourceRecordId;
//joins AL + ServicePrincipal tables together 
let AL1 = AL 
| join kind=inner (ServicePrincipal) on AppID
| extend ServicePrincipalName = coalesce(ServicePrincipalName1, ServicePrincipalName), ServicePrincipalId = coalesce(ServicePrincipalId1, ServicePrincipalId) 
| project-away ServicePrincipalId1, ServicePrincipalName1, Result, AppID1, Resource, CorrelationId, Category, targetedResourceType
| summarize AADOperationType = any(AADOperationType), IPAddresses= any(list_IPAddress), 
    any(targetedUserName) by TimeGeneratedAL, userPrincipalName, AppID, ServicePrincipalName, OperationName, targetedResourceID ;
//joins AL1 with BehaviorAnalytics table 
  BA 
  | join kind=innerunique AL1 on userPrincipalName 
  | project-away UserPrincipalName, TimeGenerated, ActionType, ActivityType, userPrincipalName1, EventSource, SourceSystem
  | project-rename TimeGenerated = TimeGeneratedAL, UserPrincipalName = userPrincipalName
  | project-reorder TimeGenerated, UserPrincipalName, InvestigationPriority, ServicePrincipalName, OperationName, targetedResourceID
  | where InvestigationPriority >= 0
